title: Ruan Renato
text:
Ruan Renato Bonifácio Augusto, known as Ruan Renato (born 14 January 1994) is a Brazilian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays as a <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> for <a href="Gabala%20FK">Gabala</a>.
Club career.
Renato made his <a href="Campeonato%20Ga%C3%BAcho">Campeonato Gaúcho</a> debut for <a href="Esporte%20Clube%20Juventude">Juventude</a> on 3 February 2016 in a game against <a href="Clube%20Esportivo%20Lajeadense">Lajeadense</a>.
On 5 August 2021, Renato signed for <a href="Azerbaijan%20Premier%20League">Azerbaijan Premier League</a> club <a href="Gabala%20FK">Gabala</a>.
